content: **crocheted star-shaped christmas decoration in drops muskat theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no r-771 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** width = approx 11 cm length = approx 14 cm with loop **materials** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 18 white 1 star weighs approx 11 g **crochet gauge** 20 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
